an1.378-393:1.1: “Mendicants, this is definitely something worth having, that is, living in the wilderness … eating only alms-food … wearing rag robes … having just three robes … teaching Dhamma … memorizing the texts on monastic training … being very learned … being respected … being well-presented … having a following … having a large following … coming from a good family … being handsome … being a good speaker … having few wishes … having good health.”
